addSalesContract(address).details: Add a sales contract that can mint tokens

allowance(address,address).details: Returns the amount of tokens approved for spender

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the balance of an account

burn(address,uint256).details: Burns tickets - used when tickets are checked in/used

constructor.details: Constructor to create token with event details

mint(address,uint256).details: Mints new tickets - only callable by authorized sales contracts

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Transfers tokens from sender to recipient using allowance
